collection: The Messages we Inscribe on our Institutions
description: Symbols of institutional values appear engraved on our buildings. Do we live up to these values? Do we try to?

images.title: Public Spirit
images.description: Inscribed around the facade of the Boston Public Library McKim building are, in my interpretation, 1) an acknowledgement of the public spirit of its founders 2) a dedication to the 'advancement of learning' and 3) a reflection that the preservation of free society in Massachusetts will require education of the public.

images.title: Academic Dedication
images.location: Picower Institute for Learning and Memory (Cambridge, MA)
